label: An IL8000 scholarship, first prize in the annual Weizman Institute-Bank Hapoalim Mathematics Olympiad, was awarded to AharonRuchman, a 12th grader in Haifa's Reali High School, at a ceremony held in the Wix Auditorium, Weizman Institute.
